question: How can I reset my password?
answer: Go to settings → account → reset password. You will receive an email with instructions.

question: What payment methods do you support?
answer: We support credit cards (Visa/Mastercard/Amex), PayPal, and bank transfers for enterprise customers.

question: Why can't I log into my account?
answer: Make sure your email is verified and that you are using the correct login credentials. If issues persist, try resetting your password.

question: How do I contact customer support?
answer: You can contact us via live chat (9 AM - 6 PM EST), email at support@company.com, or call +1-800-123-4567.

question: Can I change my subscription plan?
answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade anytime from your billing settings. Changes take effect immediately and you'll be prorated.

question: Do you support Macedonian language?
answer: Yes, our platform supports multiple languages including Macedonian, English, and 50+ others.

question: How do refunds work?
answer: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days depending on your bank. We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for annual plans.

question: Is my data secure?
answer: Yes, we use industry-standard 256-bit SSL encryption and comply with GDPR and SOC 2 Type II standards.

question: Do you have a mobile app?
answer: Yes! Our mobile app is available for iOS and Android. Download it from the App Store or Google Play.

question: What happens if I exceed my usage limits?
answer: You'll receive a notification and can either upgrade your plan or purchase additional credits as needed.

question: Can multiple team members use one account?
answer: Yes, our Team and Enterprise plans support multiple users with individual logins and customizable permissions.

question: How long does implementation take?
answer: Most customers are up and running within 24 hours. We provide onboarding support and implementation assistance for enterprise clients.

question: Do you offer API access?
answer: Yes, API access is available on Professional and Enterprise plans. Full documentation is available in your dashboard.

question: What are your business hours?
answer: Customer support is available Monday-Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM EST. Email support is monitored 24/7 for urgent issues.

question: Can I export my data?
answer: Yes, you can export all your data in CSV or JSON format from Settings → Data Export. Exports complete within 10 minutes.

question: Како да ја ресетирам мојата лозинка?
answer: Одете на поставки → сметка → ресетирај лозинка. Ќе добиете е-пошта со инструкции.

question: Кои методи на плаќање ги поддржувате?
answer: Поддржуваме кредитни картички (Visa/Mastercard/Amex), PayPal и банкарски трансфери за корпоративни клиенти.

question: Зошто не можам да се најавам на мојата сметка?
answer: Проверете дали вашата е-пошта е верификувана и дали користите точни податоци за најава. Ако проблемот продолжи, ресетирајте ја лозинката.

question: Како да контактирам со корисничка поддршка?
answer: Можете да нè контактирате преку жив разговор (9–18ч EST), е-пошта на support@company.com или телефон +1-800-123-4567.

question: Можам ли да го променам мојот план за претплата?
answer: Да, можете да надградите или намалите во секое време од поставките за наплата. Промените се применуваат веднаш.
